name: Mars Defender (akeean, Mil)
description:
Mars Defender - Become a patriotic Martian and defend your planet from being cluttered up by the various rovers, rockets and crashed probes arriving from Earth.

Click (Left Mouse Button) on those pesky Human contraptions and their wreckage to clean Mars up and prevent it from being overrun (and presumably colonized eventually).

Press ESC to go back to to the main menu.
